content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: ETCD
      operator: exists
    - name: ELEMENT
      operator: exists
    - any:
        - name: ETCD
          operator: is_not_unique_relationship
          value: ELEMENT
        - name: ELEMENT
          operator: is_not_unique_relationship
          value: ETCD
Core:
  Id: CORE-000132
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: When ETCD and ELEMENTCD are present, ETCD and  ELEMENT should have a
  one-to-one relationship.
Outcome:
  Message: ELEMENT and ETCD do not have a one-to-one relationship.
  Output Variables:
    - ETCD
    - ELEMENT
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0154
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: ETCD (the companion to ELEMENT) is limited to 8 characters
                  and does not have special character restrictions.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Specification
                Section: 5.3|7.2.1|7.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - TRIAL DESIGN
  Domains:
    Include:
      - TE
      - TA
      - SE

json.Description: When ETCD and ELEMENTCD are present, ETCD and  ELEMENT should have a one-to-one relationship.

Outcome.Message: ELEMENT and ETCD do not have a one-to-one relationship.

Citations.Cited_Guidance: ETCD (the companion to ELEMENT) is limited to 8 characters and does not have special character restrictions.
